content: enough tail to thread under the front loops of each of the round 10 s stitches pull the tail to gather the fabric knot and bury the ends into the head embroider the helmet rim with gray embroider chain stitches around the forehead on round 6 to create the rim of the helmet secure the final chain stitch bring both ends of the yarn out through the same stitch gap on round 5 tie and bury the knots into the head trim off any excess take another length of gray and sew a set of two chain stitches in an upside-down v shape just above the center of the helmet rim bring both tails out through the same stitch gap tie off and bury the knot into the head trim the excess helmet gem with red create a double overhand knot see special stitches and techniques double overhand knot take the ends of the knot and bring them through the center of the gap between the two sets of embroidered chain stitches for the helmet rim and exit out a stitch gap snug the knot against the fabric adjusting its position as needed once it s in position make sure both tails exit the same stitch gap tie the ends and bury the knot into the head trim the excess horns make two with gray create an magic_ring round 1 chain 1 4 single_crochet close ring = 4 single_crochet round 2-3 4 single_crochet = 4 single_crochet round 4 single_crochet single_crochet increase x2 = 6 single_crochet round 5-6 6 single_crochet = 6 single_crochet round 7 inv decrease single_crochet single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet = 6 single_crochet round 8 6 single_crochet = 6 single_crochet round 9 inv decrease single_crochet x2 = 4 single_crochet round 10 4 single_crochet = 4 single_crochet bobble leave a long enough tail to sew the horn onto the helmet darksol diminutive devil king 4 attach the horns position each horn onto round 4 of the helmet the horn should start to point upwards then curl down and over the sides of the face and spaced about three single_crochet away from the other horn after sewing down each horn bring the tail of the yarn out a nearby stitch gap on the helmet tie off and bury the knot into the head the horns can remain mostly hollow other than holding the yarn end from each magic_ring and can be readjusted as needed embroider the eyes take a scrap or cut a four-inch length of red yarn and split two plies away thread the two plies together on a yarn needle and run it through a stitch gap at the edge of darksol s blue face on round 7 bring the needle out the stitch gap at the fifth blue single_crochet on that round send the needle over the post of that stitch and into the next stitch gap on that row before bringing the yarn back out the original stitch gap it entered at the side of the face
